... his name also Yuri... He always
said: `Someone wants to beat you... he
has to kill you first'.
Yuri puts his hand on Jackson's shoulder.
What would you have done, if you rich
like me? Just look at your gorgeous
kids. And call me Yuri...
Yuri offers his hand but Jackson doesn't shake it.
Sasha's voice comes over the radio.
Hi guys. The plan is to refuel in
Hawaii. So, buckle up... Gordon and I
will do the rest.
Gordon turns to Sasha.
Let's get this straight, Sasha. I'm not
a pilot. I'm a plastic surgeon. I just
took some lessons to overcome my fear
of flying.
Why did you give up?
Gordon points to the declining altimeter.

dialogue.text: Gordon points to the declining altimeter.

segments.content: What about the wheels we lost at take-
off?
There's 14 on each side. Some of them
must still be there.
With that, Sasha commences the landing procedure.
The Antonov dives into a thick layer of clouds.

INT. COCKPIT/ANTONOV - NIGHT Gordon shakes his head. The two pilots stare ahead watching as the clouds slowly change color, from yellow... to orange. They stare out the window in disbelief. INT. CARGO HOLD/ANTONOV - NIGHT Gordon comes climbing down the metal ladder whispering to Jackson and Yuri.

dialogue.text: INT. COCKPIT/ANTONOV - NIGHT Gordon shakes his head. The two pilots stare ahead watching as the clouds slowly change color, from yellow... to orange. They stare out the window in disbelief. INT. CARGO HOLD/ANTONOV - NIGHT Gordon comes climbing down the metal ladder whispering to Jackson and Yuri.

segments.content: Guys, you really oughta take a look at
this.
Jackson and Yuri follow Gordon back into the cockpit. The
women exchange a worried glance.
When Jackson and Yuri enter, they don't believe their eyes.
What is that?
The State of Hawaii!
EXT. ANTONOV/OVER HAWAII - NIGHT From above we watch as the Antonov flies over an endless ocean of fiery red lava. The Islands of Hawaii have turned into one big volcano. INT. COCKPIT/ANTONOV - NIGHT

character.name: Not good. That is not good.

dialogue.text: EXT. ANTONOV/OVER HAWAII - NIGHT From above we watch as the Antonov flies over an endless ocean of fiery red lava. The Islands of Hawaii have turned into one big volcano. INT. COCKPIT/ANTONOV - NIGHT

segments.content: How much fuel do we have?
Not enough. We'll have to make a water
landing somewhere in the South China
Sea.
At least we won't need our landing
gear.
Yuri wonders.
What about it?
EXT. ANTONOV/OVER HAWAII - NIGHT The damaged landing gear slowly retracts into the vast belly of the Antonov as it veers off to the east.

character.name: We lost it all... in Vegas.

dialogue.text: EXT. ANTONOV/OVER HAWAII - NIGHT The damaged landing gear slowly retracts into the vast belly of the Antonov as it veers off to the east.

heading.raw_text: INT. PRESIDENTIAL CABIN/AIR FORCE ONE - NIGHT

segments.content:
Adrian knocks quietly and sticks his head around the door.

          Laura is sitting in her father's chair.
Can I come in?
I've got nothing to say to you.
Adrian enters. He has his travel bag in one hand. He looks at Laura and gathers himself.

dialogue.text: Adrian enters. He has his travel bag in one hand. He looks at Laura and gathers himself.

segments.content: Your Dad and I... we were trying to
protect you.
I'm a big girl Adrian. I don't need
protection. You used me. You guys had
me gallivanting around the world, as
part of your little cover-up.
But you were doing a good job.
Sure, if your name's Da Vinci or
Picasso. But if you're some young
talent in Podunk, Texas, sorry you're
not famous enough. People like you and
Anheuser and my father - you think you
can play God.
Adrian takes a moment, he's desperate to make her see.
You know what your father believed.
That nature will choose itself from
itself.
That's bullshit and you know it. It's
the fittest, the richest and the
strongest that survive.
Adrian glances down and spots Jackson's book poking out of his bag.

dialogue.text: Adrian glances down and spots Jackson's book poking out of his bag.

segments.content: What would you say were the chances of
a first time, middle-aged writer, who
barely sold 500 copies of his novel
making it on board this plane?
Adrian pulls out the book from his bag. He shows her.

dialogue.text: Adrian pulls out the book from his bag. He shows her.

segments.content: It's called `Farewell Atlantis' and
it's a fantastic read. It's part of our
legacy now.
Laura takes this in. The plane's intercom cuts through the
moment.
Mr. Helmsley, Prof. West requests your
presence immediately.
Adrian takes a breath, but before he leaves -
What if I tried to sort some of this
mess out? I need to know you can
forgive me...
Laura looks at him sadly, but with a little hope.
Adrian moves for the door. He stops.

character.name: I need to know that too, Adrian.

dialogue.text: Adrian moves for the door. He stops.

segments.content: One more thing. Your father told me you
were the most precious thing to him in
the whole world... You are to me too.
As Adrian exits, we hold on Laura's conflicted face.

The cloud from the Yellowstone eruption has hit Washington

          D.C. hard. Pennsylvania Avenue resembles a war zone. A ten

          inch layer of ash lies on the ground.

          The gates of the White House are wide open, with ash-covered

          rescue workers running about, resembling ghosts.

The President has turned the whole West Wing into a shelter.

          He walks through the packed rooms assisting where he can.

          An old African-American LADY holds a crying young girl.

          President Wilson kneels down to her.
She can't find her mother.
Why don't you two girls make yourself
comfy on that big couch? I'll see what
The child nods. The President gets up.

dialogue.text: The child nods. The President gets up.

segments.content: Sally, can you take care of them. I'll
go check with the Red Cross...
As he leaves, the old lady looks up at Sally and smiles.
No wonder the First Lady fell for him.
I knew Miss Dorothy Jones long before
the President, when she was still
singing jazz down in Atlanta with Harry
Helmsley.
EXT. FRONT LAWN/WHITE HOUSE - NIGHT The President walks up to the Red Cross tents placed on the front lawn. He stops one of the Red Cross volunteers.

dialogue.text: EXT. FRONT LAWN/WHITE HOUSE - NIGHT The President walks up to the Red Cross tents placed on the front lawn. He stops one of the Red Cross volunteers.

segments.content: Without looking up, the young guy responds.

character.name: Who can help me with missing persons?

dialogue.text: Without looking up, the young guy responds.

segments.content: He then recognizes who he's talking to.

character.name: Sorry man, I'm busy right now.

dialogue.text: He then recognizes who he's talking to.

segments.content: I mean, of course sir. I didn't
realize... What can I do for you, Mr.
The President pats him on the shoulder.

dialogue.text: The President pats him on the shoulder.

segments.content: Don't worry about it. You're doing a
great job son...
A deep, low rumble begins, stopping everybody in place.
As it builds, the President grabs onto a tent pole to secure
himself. He looks out over Washington D.C. His eyes grow
wide...
The National Mall bends like rubber. The towering Washington
Monument breaks into pieces.
An even more deafening sound makes him turn--
The Capitol Building rises from behind the trees, lifted up
by earth's incredible force.
As the whole building breaks apart, the President is thrown
to the ground.

heading.raw_text: INT. COMMAND CENTER/AIR FORCE ONE - DAY

segments.content:
All the officers and scientists are glued to monitors that

          show satellite images from all over the globe. Adrian and

          Prof. West stare in disbelief.
Laura enters the command center unnoticed.

character.name: The capitol was hit by a 9.4.

dialogue.text: Laura enters the command center unnoticed.

segments.content: We lost communication with the White
She stands there frozen, emotionless. She looks over to Anheuser, who is shouting orders. Another officer hands him a phone.

dialogue.text: She stands there frozen, emotionless. She looks over to Anheuser, who is shouting orders. Another officer hands him a phone.

segments.content: President Makarenko for you sir. He's
just entered Chinese air space.
Anheuser takes the phone and after a beat answers.
That's affirmative, Mr. President.
Until communication is restored, I am
in command.
Adrian and Laura look to each other baffled.
... It seems all other Heads of State
are en route, however there are
unconfirmed reports that the Italian
Prime Minister has also decided to stay
behind and trust in prayer rather than
action...

Pope Benedict XVI holds mass in St. Peter's Basilica.

          Millions of followers flood Vatican City. It's a sea of

          candles.

          Amidst the mass of believers we see the Italian Prime

          Minister Antonioni with his family clinging to him. They all

          are praying.

          A low RUMBLE. People look around frightened. In the distance

          we hear SCREAMING.

A few cardinals huddle together in silent prayer under

          Michelangelo's famous fresco. Most prominent above them is

          `The Creation of Adam'.

          The cardinals look up in horror as the rumbling intensifies.

          A crack forms on the ceiling, shooting straight through God

          touching the finger of Adam.

          Then the whole fresco breaks apart.

The people in St. Peter's square begin to panic--

          The entire Vatican is lifted up in the air. We hold on the

          Prime Minister and his family, as the basilica collapses onto

          the fleeing masses.

heading.raw_text: EXT. MOUNT CORCOVADO/RIO DE JANEIRO - DAY

segments.content:
The giant statue of `Christ the Redeemer' on Mount Corcovado.

          Behind it, we see Rio de Janeiro being obliterated by violent

          quakes.
The famous statue of Jesus Christ begins to topple over and
crashes down the mountain.

Neng Pang, the young Tibetan monk drives his truck up a bumpy

          mountain pass. His parents huddle in the back of the pick-up.

          The steering wheel is vibrating badly in his hands as he

          slides the clutch and downshifts. As the vehicle slows on the

          steep incline, the vibrations become much worse. Neng worries

          that the truck may be breaking down.

          He pulls up and switches off the engine but to his surprise

          the steering wheel continues to vibrate.

          Looking out the windshield, he sees the whole earth shaking

          violently.
(in Chinese)
Rocks fall all around them.

dialogue.text: Rocks fall all around them.

segments.content:
Jackson sits inside one of the luxury cars and tries the

          radio. Kate opens the passenger door and gets in.
Couldn't sleep huh? Me neither.
Anything?
Nothing, just static. Not even an
emergency signal.
I can't think about what's going on
down there.
Jackson switches off the radio.
I wanted to thank you. For coming back
for us.
Silence. They both look out through the front windshield at Lilly and Noah curled up together.

dialogue.text: Silence. They both look out through the front windshield at Lilly and Noah curled up together.

segments.content: Do you think people change?
By `people' are we talking about me?
Do you think you've changed since we
separated?
Well I certainly eat a lot more cereal
now...
You know, you always had tunnel vision.
You could always just block things out
and write. You blocked all of us out
He thinks about this and can't help asking.

dialogue.text: He thinks about this and can't help asking.

segments.content: Do you love him? Gordon...
Kate gets out of the car and shuts the door. He watches her go.

dialogue.text: Kate gets out of the car and shuts the door. He watches her go.

heading.raw_text: INT. COMMAND CENTER/AIR FORCE ONE - DAY

segments.content: The computers buzz with the incoming data.
... Cho Ming reports the first tremors,
however none higher than 5.0.
Anheuser looks relieved. Then the big news hits.
The crust has begun to shift, Prof.
West.
By what degree?
1.2 percent, but still moving.
Any clue what to expect next,
Professor?
Once the movement of our land masses
comes to a halt, we expect the
formation of tidal waves, sir...
proportional to the magnitude of the
corresponding quakes.
Adrian looks distressed as he turns to one of the officers.
Do we have any news from the Japanese
seaboard?
Laura notices Adrian's concern.
We've recorded two quakes averaging
She grabs Adrian's hand. Anheuser sees this and his
suspicions about them are confirmed. A cold little smile
appears on his face.

Tony is watching TV with a group of passengers. Harry has

          just entered and stands near the back of the room.

          A TEENAGE BOY with bad acne searches for an available channel

          that is still broadcasting. He finds a news program with

          lousy reception.
... Tokyo seems to have taken the
severity of the hit... Unconfirmed
reports indicate that the entire island
of Japan is below water...
The signal gets weaker.
Harry watches Tony slowly stand up. As he turns to his
friend, his knees begin to buckle. His face is pale.
I called... But I never got through.
Tony only stares back at him. Behind them, the TV rolls to the side, as the whole room begins to tilt. Harry grabs on to the door frame, as the passengers along with Tony fall like dominoes.

dialogue.text: Tony only stares back at him. Behind them, the TV rolls to the side, as the whole room begins to tilt. Harry grabs on to the door frame, as the passengers along with Tony fall like dominoes.

segments.content: As the ship rolls to the side, Harry finds himself hanging from the door frame now 20 feet off the ground. He's barely able to pull himself up and roll onto the middle deck. EXT. MIDDLE DECK/CRUISE SHIP - NIGHT On his back, Harry is shocked to see the star field and the moon shifting across the sky. An eerie sound fills the air. A gigantic swell has formed off to his right. It's a mountain of water. Harry turns to see another gargantuan swell close in from the other side of the `Freedom of the Seas'.

dialogue.text: As the ship rolls to the side, Harry finds himself hanging from the door frame now 20 feet off the ground. He's barely able to pull himself up and roll onto the middle deck. EXT. MIDDLE DECK/CRUISE SHIP - NIGHT On his back, Harry is shocked to see the star field and the moon shifting across the sky. An eerie sound fills the air. A gigantic swell has formed off to his right. It's a mountain of water. Harry turns to see another gargantuan swell close in from the other side of the `Freedom of the Seas'.

segments.content:
The old walled city of Shibam is in ruins. The 2,000-year-old

          towers lie on the desert ground. Hundreds of believers have

          gathered to pray towards Mecca.

          As they raise their hands to heaven in unison, they slow

          their motion and the chanting dissipates.

          They stare into the distance not knowing if what they see is

          reality or only a mirage.

          A monstrous tidal wave rises from the desert sands thundering

          towards them.

President Wilson's body lays between the rubble. As he slowly

          regains consciousness, all he can hear is the flapping sound

          of the collapsed Red Cross tents.
As President Wilson gets to his feet, he sees--
A tidal wave come sweeping over the remains of the Washington
Mall and it carries with it the battleships of the 14th Fleet
of the US Navy that were anchored in Chesapeake Bay.
The President looks ahead, calm and peaceful.
The CAMERA follows the aircraft carrier `USS John F. Kennedy' as it slams broadside into the White House.

dialogue.text: The CAMERA follows the aircraft carrier `USS John F. Kennedy' as it slams broadside into the White House.

heading.raw_text: INT. COMMAND CENTER/AIR FORCE ONE - DAY

segments.content:
Hushed voices. Anheuser, Adrian and Prof. West stand amongst

          a group of officers and analysts.
All global ground communication has
ceased sir.
The only signal our satellites are
picking up are coming from the vessels
in Cho Ming.
Anheuser turns to Adrian.

dialogue.text: Anheuser turns to Adrian.

segments.content: Would our science advisor care to give
us his assessment?
We expect enormous tsunamis to reach
landfall in every continent. The Cho
Ming area will be impacted in
approximately six hours.
He nods to one of the analysts, who types in a couple of
commands.
... and it looks like the crust has
shifted by nearly 23 degrees in a south-
westerly direction. Here's the computer
simulation.
Everybody stares as the graphic illustrates what happened to
planet Earth.
Our data also shows, that our earth's
poles have reversed their magnetic
fields...
... These are their new positions.
Anheuser looks at the monitor, then turns to Adrian.
So Helmsley, what you're telling us
here is that... the north pole is now
somewhere in Wisconsin?
Silence. Adrian clears his throat.
An ALARM SIGNAL goes off--

dialogue.text: An ALARM SIGNAL goes off--

segments.content: A red light blinks on the plane's instrument panel.
What's that?
Engine failure. GOVNO! Two of six are
down. We must get ready.
Yuri and Jackson are standing behind the pilots.

Yuri nods and they make their way back to the lower deck. INT. CARGO HOLD/ANTONOV - DAWN Jackson's family are all asleep in their seats, Lilly in her mom's lap. She looks like a little angel. Jackson can't bear to wake them. He caresses Lilly's face.

character.name: Let's go wake up the kids.

dialogue.text: Yuri nods and they make their way back to the lower deck. INT. CARGO HOLD/ANTONOV - DAWN Jackson's family are all asleep in their seats, Lilly in her mom's lap. She looks like a little angel. Jackson can't bear to wake them. He caresses Lilly's face.

segments.content: Jackson turns to see Noah is awake.

dialogue.text: Jackson turns to see Noah is awake.

segments.content: What are you talking about? I don't
hate Gordon.
But you don't like him either.
I don't know him that well.
But I know him. He's really nice. You
should talk to him more often. You guys
would get along really well.
This breaks Jackson's heart. He pulls Noah tightly to his
chest.
Kate opens her eyes.

character.name: I'll give it a try, Noah. I promise.

dialogue.text: Kate opens her eyes.

segments.content: Jackson nods.

dialogue.text: Jackson nods.

segments.content: Wake up Lil'bee. We're getting ready to
land.
On the opposite side of the aircraft, Yuri and Tamara help
the twins get into their life vests. Noah is suspicious.
Jackson looks at his kids. They both look scared.

dialogue.text: Jackson looks at his kids. They both look scared.

segments.content: Sasha told us, it could get a little
bumpy... and wet.
The Antonov jerks to the side. Two more engines out. Alarm
signals flash.

The remaining two engines barely hold the plane in the air as

          it dives into the clouds.

Jackson and his family huddle together. He puts his arms

          around Lilly and Noah.
In the background, Gordon climbs down from the cockpit. He is about to speak when he hears Jackson's voice.

character.name: Your daddy has to tell you something.

dialogue.text: In the background, Gordon climbs down from the cockpit. He is about to speak when he hears Jackson's voice.

segments.content: I know that with my writing and work I
didn't have a lot of time for you
both...
Jackson glances at Kate.
I wasn't there for you, the way I
should have been.
Jackson looks Kate directly in the eyes.
... And I am so very sorry for that.
Gordon watches as Kate pulls the kids and Jackson tight. For
the first time, they seem a little like the family they once
were.
Jackson, Yuri... I think you guys
should come back up here.

First Jackson and then Yuri enter the cockpit. Sasha points

          out of the window.
Behind them Yuri and Jackson stare at the snow covered mountains of the Himalayas.

character.name: Don't ask me how that happened.

dialogue.text: Behind them Yuri and Jackson stare at the snow covered mountains of the Himalayas.

segments.content: There's no more ocean, and it looks
like we're pretty close to where we
wanted to go.
It's as if the whole earth shifted by
1500 miles...
No shit.
It's called 'Earth Crust Displacement'
Jackson brims with joy.

dialogue.text: Jackson brims with joy.

segments.content: A JOLT!

dialogue.text: A JOLT!

segments.content: The plane drops rapidly, nearly scraping the tip of a mountain. Sasha and Gordon are doing all they can to keep the Antonov in the air. A vast glacier spreads out in front of them.

character.name: We lost our last two engines.

dialogue.text: The plane drops rapidly, nearly scraping the tip of a mountain. Sasha and Gordon are doing all they can to keep the Antonov in the air. A vast glacier spreads out in front of them.

segments.content: I'll shoot for that glacier. Drain the
brake fluids. It's going to get
rocky... There, the blue levers!
The plane plummets, loosing altitude fast.
Listen up guys! This may sound a little
crazy, but here's what you got to do...
Jackson and Yuri come running. Yuri yells at his boys.
(in Russian)
Get up! Follow me!
Yuri bear, what are we doing?
INT. COCKPIT/ANTONOV - DAWN Sasha is struggling with the gyrating wheel. The glittering snow field comes flying towards them.

dialogue.text: INT. COCKPIT/ANTONOV - DAWN Sasha is struggling with the gyrating wheel. The glittering snow field comes flying towards them.

segments.content: CHTO ZA... Gordon! We're still too
fast!
Sasha pulls the Antonov back up.

Gordon yanks with all his might. A loud NOISE. INT. CARGO HOLD/ANTONOV - DAWN The cargo door drops open. The Antonov is extremely close to the glacier's surface. Jackson tries to start the Bentley, but nothing happens. Everyone screams in panic.

dialogue.text: Gordon yanks with all his might. A loud NOISE. INT. CARGO HOLD/ANTONOV - DAWN The cargo door drops open. The Antonov is extremely close to the glacier's surface. Jackson tries to start the Bentley, but nothing happens. Everyone screams in panic.

segments.content:
They all go quiet, except for a few muffled barks from

          Caesar. Yuri speaks towards the dashboard, slowly and

          clearly.
The motor revs to life. Yuri looks at Jackson.

dialogue.text: The motor revs to life. Yuri looks at Jackson.

segments.content: INT. COCKPIT/ANTONOV - DAWN Sasha barely holds on. He yells at Gordon.

character.name: Voice control... Sold me on it.

dialogue.text: INT. COCKPIT/ANTONOV - DAWN Sasha barely holds on. He yells at Gordon.

segments.content: Your turn Gordon! Go! Make sure that
they make it out of here before I touch
down!
What about you?!
I'll be fine! I have to land this
thing!
Gordon hesitates.
What are you waiting for!
Sasha nods at him reassuringly. Gordon bolts out.

The cargo door scrapes against the glacier, hurling ice

          everywhere. The Bentley roars.
Push it Curtis!
Noah turns and sees Gordon.

character.name: We're waiting for Sasha and Gordon.

dialogue.text: Noah turns and sees Gordon.

segments.content: Gordon jumps in. Tamara yells at him in desperation.

dialogue.text: Gordon jumps in. Tamara yells at him in desperation.

segments.content: Where's Sasha?
He said he'll be fine and we should get
out of here before he touches down.
Yuri notices Tamara's distress as she keeps looking back to
the cockpit. Jackson slams the pedal down trying to gain as
much speed as possible to soften their landing.

The Bentley shoots out the back of the plane. As it hits the snow, the air bags deploy cushioning the passengers. The Antonov hits the ice and catapults the rest of the luxury cars out of the back cargo hold. They barrel past the Bentley like skittles, narrowly missing it as they fly off in opposite directions. The plane skids across the glacier, clipping its wing and causing the aircraft to break apart. Sasha has no control anymore and watches helplessly as he shoots towards the ledge in the Antonov, plunging into the deep. The plane crashes and explodes.

dialogue.text: The Bentley shoots out the back of the plane. As it hits the snow, the air bags deploy cushioning the passengers. The Antonov hits the ice and catapults the rest of the luxury cars out of the back cargo hold. They barrel past the Bentley like skittles, narrowly missing it as they fly off in opposite directions. The plane skids across the glacier, clipping its wing and causing the aircraft to break apart. Sasha has no control anymore and watches helplessly as he shoots towards the ledge in the Antonov, plunging into the deep. The plane crashes and explodes.

segments.content:
As the snow settles we see that the glacier is scattered with

          luxury cars tomb-stoned in the snow.

          The Bentley is half buried. We hear Caesar barking.
Everybody okay back there?

The door opens and Jackson climbs out, looking around. Just above the wind, he hears the SOUND OF HELICOPTER BLADES. One by one the others appear behind Jackson and stare at a surreal sight-- Several Chinese Mil-26 choppers airlift animals over the mountain pass. GIRAFFES, ZEBRAS, EVEN ELEPHANTS hang by huge straps from these flying machines. One of the smaller helicopters veers from the transport fleet and lands near the Bentley. Armed soldiers jump out. Their Commander speaks to them in a sharp tone.

dialogue.text: The door opens and Jackson climbs out, looking around. Just above the wind, he hears the SOUND OF HELICOPTER BLADES. One by one the others appear behind Jackson and stare at a surreal sight-- Several Chinese Mil-26 choppers airlift animals over the mountain pass. GIRAFFES, ZEBRAS, EVEN ELEPHANTS hang by huge straps from these flying machines. One of the smaller helicopters veers from the transport fleet and lands near the Bentley. Armed soldiers jump out. Their Commander speaks to them in a sharp tone.

segments.content: Welcome to the People's Republic of
Jackson nods to them.

dialogue.text: Jackson nods to them.

segments.content: Thank you...
(to Lilly and Noah)
The others acknowledge the soldiers as well. Hi... Hello...

dialogue.text: The others acknowledge the soldiers as well. Hi... Hello...

segments.content: Jackson stands dumbfounded. The Commander repeats.

dialogue.text: Jackson stands dumbfounded. The Commander repeats.

segments.content: Still no answer. He yells an order. The soldiers point their guns at them.

character.name: What color are your boarding passes?

dialogue.text: Still no answer. He yells an order. The soldiers point their guns at them.

segments.content: Surprised, Jackson turns to Yuri who's holding up three green plastic cards.

dialogue.text: Surprised, Jackson turns to Yuri who's holding up three green plastic cards.

segments.content: Tamara can't believe what she's hearing.

dialogue.text: Tamara can't believe what she's hearing.

segments.content: It's a joke... a mistake...
Yuri shrugs. Tamara lunges at him.

dialogue.text: Yuri shrugs. Tamara lunges at him.

segments.content: (in Russian)
Yuri brushes her off, coldly. And then speaks so they can all understand him.

dialogue.text: Yuri brushes her off, coldly. And then speaks so they can all understand him.

segments.content: You think I did not know about you and
Sasha? May god rest that poor bastard's
soul.
With that Yuri turns to the others.
I am sorry guys. Good luck. And Jackson
remember, if someone wants to beat
you... he has to kill you first. Come
boys!
The twins grab Caesar and climb into the helicopter. The dog
barks furiously, wanting to stay with Tamara.
The next moment, the helicopter takes off.
They're stranded.

dialogue.text: They're stranded.

heading.raw_text: EXT. AIRFIELD IN CHO MING VALLEY/TIBET - DAWN

segments.content:
Air Force One is in the background as Laura, Anheuser, and

          other members of the crew are rushed towards a group of

          waiting helicopters.
Adrian is a little way back in the middle of the pack. A
Chinese Officer with a list shouts over the noise.
Mr. Anheuser - you're in Chopper 1. Dr.
Laura and Anheuser reach the chopper. An authoritative Naval Officer greets them, and raises his voice.

dialogue.text: Laura and Anheuser reach the chopper. An authoritative Naval Officer greets them, and raises his voice.

segments.content: I'm Captain Richard Michaels. I'm the
skipper of the American boat sir. After
you!
Anheuser nods and climbs in the chopper. Captain Michaels
helps Laura in. Adrian arrives just as the Chopper door
slides shut and it lifts off.
Laura catches Adrian's look of unease before they soar away.
My sincerest condolences Dr. Wilson,
for your father...
Laura's look thanks him for this. He turns to Anheuser.
Your party is the last to arrive.
I've been told of damages?
We haven't completed the assessment but
it looks like we lost Number 4 when the
crust shifted.
Captain Michaels looks up and points into the distance.
EXT. CHO MING VALLEY/TIBET - DAWN The CAMERA follows the choppers revealing-- Nine gigantic oval gates that measure at least 60 stories, built into the face of a mountain.

dialogue.text: EXT. CHO MING VALLEY/TIBET - DAWN The CAMERA follows the choppers revealing-- Nine gigantic oval gates that measure at least 60 stories, built into the face of a mountain.

segments.content: In front of every gate there is a line of huge `Y' shaped
metal support structures, which are the launching towers for
the ships. They are each at least 800 feet high. It's an
unparalleled feat of engineering.

The lead chopper descends onto a platform in front of one of

          the gates, dwarfed against this majestic setting.

          The door slides open and Anheuser jumps out. Laura follows.

          She looks around in awe.

          Even the utility entrances that lead into the mountain are

          immense. The Captain guides them into the hollow mountain.

          In the BACKGROUND we see an angry Yuri scream and argue with

          military personnel, waving his tickets.
What do mean we can't board Number 4? I
want to speak to your supervisor.
I am the supervisor! Now get in line
with all the others while we make
arrangements.
I want your name!
(pointing to his
Can you read? Now get the hell back
with the other green cards, or I'll
have you detained.
The twins stand nearby, holding Caesar. They look afraid.

Jackson and his group are small specks in a barren landscape.

          They have made it down the glacier and are now walking over a

          scree field.

          It is hard going. Jackson carries Lilly.
Keep thinking warm thoughts sweetheart.
You're doing great.
Kate holds Noah by the hand. Gordon and Tamara trail behind.
She's still very upset.
I should have listened to you, Dr.
Silberman. I actually liked the way I
looked before that monster talked me
into it.
Did you know he asked for a discount...
and he paid in installments?
Cheap bastard.
You're better off without him. What he
said about you and Sasha, is it true?
Tamara nods silently.
Now that he's gone I think he was worth
a hundred times a man like Yuri.
Suddenly they hear the PUTTERING of an engine.

In the distance, an old rusty truck comes bumping down the dirt road. Jackson puts down Lilly and chases after it. EXT. DIRT ROAD/NEAR CHO MING - DAWN Neng and his parents drive past, billowing a huge cloud of dust just as Jackson reaches the road.

dialogue.text: In the distance, an old rusty truck comes bumping down the dirt road. Jackson puts down Lilly and chases after it. EXT. DIRT ROAD/NEAR CHO MING - DAWN Neng and his parents drive past, billowing a huge cloud of dust just as Jackson reaches the road.

segments.content: (out of breath)
But Neng doesn't hear him over the rattling truck. Jackson, pissed, kicks at the rocks on the road.

dialogue.text: But Neng doesn't hear him over the rattling truck. Jackson, pissed, kicks at the rocks on the road.

segments.content: Just then, Neng's mother, sitting in the back of the truck, turns and sees his tantrum. She bangs on the rear window of the cabin. Neng looks in the mirror and hits the brakes. Jackson can't believe his luck.

dialogue.text: Just then, Neng's mother, sitting in the back of the truck, turns and sees his tantrum. She bangs on the rear window of the cabin. Neng looks in the mirror and hits the brakes. Jackson can't believe his luck.

segments.content: The others show up and they all run towards the truck.

Anheuser and Laura follow Captain Michaels and a Chinese

          Steward over one of the many boarding bridges erected inside

          the cavernous mountain that lead to one of the monstrous

          arks. Laura stops halfway, gazing in awe--

          Deep down below, thousands of workers are swarming over the

          ship, readying it for launch.

          Laura looks up and sees the contrast, spotting the SHEIK we

          met in the Dorchester Hotel as he boards comfortably with his

          huge family.

          Laura points down at the workers.
Captain Michaels? What happens to all
those people?
The Captain doesn't know what to say. Anheuser turns.
Dr. Wilson, there's a protocol for all
that. You just stick to your art. We'll
handle the rest.
Laura hates him in that moment.
Anheuser and Captain Michaels move away as Laura stands and watches the frantic workers who are now boarding the animals we saw being airlifted over the mountains.

dialogue.text: Anheuser and Captain Michaels move away as Laura stands and watches the frantic workers who are now boarding the animals we saw being airlifted over the mountains.

segments.content: Laura has a look of guilt as she follows the steward.

character.name: Dr. Wilson? Your cabin is this way.

dialogue.text: Laura has a look of guilt as she follows the steward.

heading.subject: MOUNTAINS/EAST COAST OF INDIA
heading.raw_text: EXT. NAMPAN MOUNTAINS/EAST COAST OF INDIA - SUNRISE

segments.content:
Thousands are on the march up the mountains. Behind them a

          valley stretches into the horizon. Plumes of smoke rise from

          destroyed cities in the distance.
Amongst the refugees, we discover Satnam, the young
astrophysicist, holding his little son. The rest of Satnam's
family trails behind.
Distant WARNING SIRENS pierce the silent march, coming from
the cities below.
People start to scream and run, but Satnam stands there
frozen. He fumbles for his satellite phone, then hits a
number on its speed dial.

Adrian is unpacking. He lays down his copy of `Farewell

          Atlantis' just as his cell phone rings.
Satnam?
Where are you?
Adrian's face goes pale.

dialogue.text: Adrian's face goes pale.

segments.content: What?!
There's a tidal wave coming from the
East! It's huge!
Satnam, what happened?
We never got picked up, Adrian, the
airlift never came!
Adrian closes his eyes.

heading.subject: MOUNTAINS/EAST COAST OF INDIA
heading.raw_text: EXT. NAMPAN MOUNTAINS/EAST COAST OF INDIA - SUNRISE

segments.content: Satnam swallows hard. He stares out into the valley.

A wall of undulating foam and debris comes rolling towards him. A tidal wave of gigantic height. Everybody panics and scratches for a higher elevation. But for Satnam it is clear, they do not stand a chance.

dialogue.text: A wall of undulating foam and debris comes rolling towards him. A tidal wave of gigantic height. Everybody panics and scratches for a higher elevation. But for Satnam it is clear, they do not stand a chance.

segments.content: He picks up his little son, squeezing him tightly to his
chest, humming an Indian lullaby for the scared child.

Adrian hears SCREAMING on the phone and the deafening sound

          of the approaching wave. He tenses up, desperate but unable

          to do anything.

          As the noise reaches its height, the line goes dead. Adrian

          is left breathless.

Adrian storms onto the bridge. Many officers and analysts are

          at work under Captain Michaels.
Do we have the latest satellite images
of Napam, India?
Anheuser and Prof. West step over and join him.

dialogue.text: Anheuser and Prof. West step over and join him.

segments.content: Helmsley, what's going on here?
They all stare at the monitor showing several tidal waves coming in from the south.

character.name: Looks like our model was wrong.

dialogue.text: They all stare at the monitor showing several tidal waves coming in from the south.

segments.content: Satnam was talking about a wave from
the East.
A science officer selects a different quadrant on the
satellite display. They all stare at the new tidal wave
that's coming from the East of the Cho Ming valley.
Anheuser is shocked.

dialogue.text: Anheuser is shocked.

segments.content: What does this mean?
The flooding will happen earlier.
Bobby, can you plug in the new data
please?
As the officer does this, Prof. West looks at Adrian with
questioning eyes.
Prof. West is horrified.

dialogue.text: Prof. West is horrified.

segments.content: Adrian turns back to the monitor and sees the new tidal wave that is coming towards the Cho Ming valley.

dialogue.text: Adrian turns back to the monitor and sees the new tidal wave that is coming towards the Cho Ming valley.

segments.content: This one is at least 1500    meters high!
Talk to me Helmsley. What does this
mean for us?
Bobby, plug in the new data and adjust
the count down?
Every one on the bridge stares at a display. It reads--
02hrs - 09min - 07sec
The science officer nervously hits a few keys and the display
changes to--
00hrs - 28min - 10sec... and counting.
We see the shock on Anheuser's face.
Get me the other Heads of State.

heading.raw_text: EXT. GATE/CHO MING SITE - EARLY MORNING

segments.content:
Neng's truck, loaded with Jackson and the others, creeps up

          to the service entrance of the launch site.

          A lone figure awaits them. This is Neng's older brother Lin,

          who we saw signing up for the 'Chinese Dam Project'.

          Lin notices the strangers in the pick-up truck.
(in Chinese)
Neng answers hesitantly.

dialogue.text: Neng answers hesitantly.

segments.content: We found them by the side of the road,
my brother.
You must send them back.
I am a follower of the great Lama Yak
The others watch the interaction but do not understand. Jackson senses a problem. He grabs Lilly and Noah.

character.name: La. You know I cannot do that.

dialogue.text: The others watch the interaction but do not understand. Jackson senses a problem. He grabs Lilly and Noah.

segments.content: Gordon and Tamara stare perplexed as Jackson approaches Lin with his kids.

dialogue.text: Gordon and Tamara stare perplexed as Jackson approaches Lin with his kids.

segments.content: At least take our children with you.
Lin answers in broken English.

dialogue.text: Lin answers in broken English.

segments.content: Why should I do that?
For the same reason you sent for your
parents.
Lin stares at him stone faced. In desperation, Kate turns to
Mrs. Pang.
I have no clue if you understand what
I'm saying, but I ask you as a mother,
please take my kids with you!
Silence. A beat. The old Chinese lady turns to Lin.
(in Chinese)
We are all children of this earth.
My plan will not work for so many,
mother.
She looks up at her son, determined.
Mr. Pang nods and reluctantly, Lin motions to Jackson to follow. Kate bows to Mrs. Pang.

character.name: We will take them all. Bata?

dialogue.text: Mr. Pang nods and reluctantly, Lin motions to Jackson to follow. Kate bows to Mrs. Pang.

segments.content: Jackson and the others acknowledge what Kate has done.

character.name: Thank you ma'am. Thank you so much.

dialogue.text: Jackson and the others acknowledge what Kate has done.

heading.raw_text: INT. SHIP BAY/CHO MING - EARLY MORNING

segments.content:
We finally reveal the unbelievable magnitude of this ship

          yard, built into the hollow belly of the mountains.

          Nine gargantuan vessels are lined up next to each other.

          Their size is at least four times that of the `Freedom of the

          Seas'. However, they look more like spaceships than anything,

          having been built aerodynamically to withstand the full force

          of nature.

          But only three of these monstrous ARKS are complete. Number 4

          is being repaired, all the others are still under

          construction, surrounded by scaffolding.

          Suddenly SIRENS goes off!

          The boarding bridges to the finished vessels begin to

          retract. There's growing confusion among the thousands of

          workers and security personnel.

heading.raw_text: INT. PLATFORM, SHIP BAY/CHO MING - EARLY MORNING

segments.content:
Opposite the boarding bridges, on a large platform, Yuri and

          his boys sit in line with the other waiting passengers.

          They watch as massive stern gates begin to close. Yuri jumps

          up and yells to the others.
The soldier from earlier points his gun at him.

dialogue.text: The soldier from earlier points his gun at him.

segments.content: Caesar barks at the guy.

dialogue.text: Caesar barks at the guy.

segments.content: Look! Idiot! They are leaving you
behind too!
The soldier turns to the ships and Yuri knocks him out. He
grabs his boys and runs towards the closing gates. All the
other passengers surge forward with him.
In the distance, on the bow side of the ships, the huge
mountain gates of the bay open, revealing a stunning view of
Cho Ming Valley.

Lin leads his group over a ridge. In front of their eyes--

          The gates to the mountain open!
(in Chinese)
We have to hurry!
(to Jackson)

They follow Lin rushing down the hill, towards one of the many Y-shaped launch structures towering in front of the gates. Neng and Kate help Mr. and Mrs. Pang down the rocky terrain. INT. SHIP BAY/CHO MING - MORNING A screeching and thundering noise! THE THREE COMPLETED VESSELS BEGIN TO INCH FORWARD on metal girders connecting the Y-shaped launch towers. INT. LIVING QUARTERS/AMERICAN SHIP - MORNING Laura feels a jolt. She rushes out of her small cabin and into a swarm of people moving down a crammed endless corridor. She struggles to fight her way through. A digital voice blares over the speakers.

character.name: They launch! We run out of time!

dialogue.text: They follow Lin rushing down the hill, towards one of the many Y-shaped launch structures towering in front of the gates. Neng and Kate help Mr. and Mrs. Pang down the rocky terrain. INT. SHIP BAY/CHO MING - MORNING A screeching and thundering noise! THE THREE COMPLETED VESSELS BEGIN TO INCH FORWARD on metal girders connecting the Y-shaped launch towers. INT. LIVING QUARTERS/AMERICAN SHIP - MORNING Laura feels a jolt. She rushes out of her small cabin and into a swarm of people moving down a crammed endless corridor. She struggles to fight her way through. A digital voice blares over the speakers.

segments.content: Countdown to departure. Launch in 17
minutes - 42 seconds.
Laura bumps into one of Adrian's Science Officers.
Where can I find Adrian Helmsley?
He's in the Technical Command Centre.

EXT. LAUNCH SITE/CHO MING VALLEY - MORNING The three gigantic vessels emerge from the mountain, into the open. Support helicopters swarm around them like flies. EXT. BENEATH A LAUNCHING TOWER/CHO-MING - MORNING Lin and his group look like ants as they scale the metal ladders of one of the launch towers. INT. BRIDGE/AMERICAN SHIP - MORNING Verbal commands fly back and forth. Anheuser watches the preparations from a large window. He looks over to the command bridges of the other vessels as they continue to be pulled into place. INT. COMMAND BRIDGES/OTHER SHIPS - MORNING We cut to the various Heads of State, all at their command posts. EXT. TOP OF LAUNCHING TOWER/CHO MING - MORNING A hatch opens at the top of the launch tower. Lin is the first to climb out. Right before his eyes, the hull of the American Ship slowly creeps towards him. He's but a speck against this man-made behemoth. Lin hastily pulls the others up.

dialogue.text: EXT. LAUNCH SITE/CHO MING VALLEY - MORNING The three gigantic vessels emerge from the mountain, into the open. Support helicopters swarm around them like flies. EXT. BENEATH A LAUNCHING TOWER/CHO-MING - MORNING Lin and his group look like ants as they scale the metal ladders of one of the launch towers. INT. BRIDGE/AMERICAN SHIP - MORNING Verbal commands fly back and forth. Anheuser watches the preparations from a large window. He looks over to the command bridges of the other vessels as they continue to be pulled into place. INT. COMMAND BRIDGES/OTHER SHIPS - MORNING We cut to the various Heads of State, all at their command posts. EXT. TOP OF LAUNCHING TOWER/CHO MING - MORNING A hatch opens at the top of the launch tower. Lin is the first to climb out. Right before his eyes, the hull of the American Ship slowly creeps towards him. He's but a speck against this man-made behemoth. Lin hastily pulls the others up.

segments.content: (in Chinese)
Faster, Neng! Help father! Mother, give
me your hand.
It's a race against time. The huge ship's hull closes in
fast. Lin and his family crawl up the side arm while Jackson
hurries to pull up the rest of the group.
Lilly freezes at the sight of the approaching ship.

Jackson rips her out of harm's way, just in time. In a frenzy, he pushes her up the support arm where the others are already huddled on a small platform. As the towering wall of steel passes by them, inches from their faces, Mr. Pang loses his balance. Jackson and Lin both see this, but Jackson is closer-- He grabs the old man by his arm, saving him from falling to his death. For the first time, Lin acknowledges Jackson with a nod. EXT. SHIP BAY/CHO MING SITE - MORNING The three completed ships are half way out, grinding to their final launching position. A mob of passengers led by Yuri has fought their way to the ship. More and more people join them, including soldiers. EXT. TOP OF LAUNCHING TOWER/CHO MING - MORNING Lin, Jackson and the group are huddled on the platform. The sound of SCREAMING PEOPLE makes them turn. The storming masses have arrived at the access platform. There is now a huge drop off between them and the tails of the ships.

dialogue.text: Jackson rips her out of harm's way, just in time. In a frenzy, he pushes her up the support arm where the others are already huddled on a small platform. As the towering wall of steel passes by them, inches from their faces, Mr. Pang loses his balance. Jackson and Lin both see this, but Jackson is closer-- He grabs the old man by his arm, saving him from falling to his death. For the first time, Lin acknowledges Jackson with a nod. EXT. More and more people join them, including soldiers. EXT. TOP OF LAUNCHING TOWER/CHO MING - MORNING Lin, Jackson and the group are huddled on the platform. The sound of SCREAMING PEOPLE makes them turn. The storming masses have arrived at the access platform. There is now a huge drop off between them and the tails of the ships.

segments.content: Next to Yuri are his twins, holding Caesar. She yells!

dialogue.text: Next to Yuri are his twins, holding Caesar. She yells!

segments.content: EXT. ACCESS PLATFORM/CHO MING SITE - MORNING The little dog hears Tamara and jumps out of Oleg's arms, leaping onto one of the thick cables, that connects the platform with the launching towers. Alec and Oleg attempt to run after Caesar, but Yuri grabs them by their necks.

dialogue.text: EXT. ACCESS PLATFORM/CHO MING SITE - MORNING The little dog hears Tamara and jumps out of Oleg's arms, leaping onto one of the thick cables, that connects the platform with the launching towers. Alec and Oleg attempt to run after Caesar, but Yuri grabs them by their necks.

segments.content: Let that stupid dog go!
He's panicked. The arriving masses are pushing them to the
drop off at the edge of the platform.

heading.raw_text: EXT. TOP OF LAUNCHING TOWER/CHO MING - MORNING

segments.content:
The ship has reached its targeted position. A small hatch

          lines up directly in front of Lin and his group.
(in Chinese)
One by one they all climb into the hatch. Jackson being the last in, notices that Tamara has stayed back.

dialogue.text: One by one they all climb into the hatch. Jackson being the last in, notices that Tamara has stayed back.

segments.content: She doesn't move, anxiously waiting for her beloved dog darting towards her. EXT. ACCESS PLATFORM/CHO MING SITE - MORNING The mob pushes at Yuri and his boys. Passengers on either side tumble off the platform. Yuri watches one of them fall, hitting his head against a tiny ledge 8 feet below. To his right, he sees a small ladder leading down.

dialogue.text: She doesn't move, anxiously waiting for her beloved dog darting towards her. EXT. ACCESS PLATFORM/CHO MING SITE - MORNING The mob pushes at Yuri and his boys. Passengers on either side tumble off the platform. Yuri watches one of them fall, hitting his head against a tiny ledge 8 feet below. To his right, he sees a small ladder leading down.

segments.content: (in Russian)
As they hurry down the ladder, people keep tumbling into the deep. Reaching the ledge, Oleg discovers Caesar running towards Tamara.

character.name: Down there! Oleg, you go first!

dialogue.text: As they hurry down the ladder, people keep tumbling into the deep. Reaching the ledge, Oleg discovers Caesar running towards Tamara.

segments.content: Yuri cannot believe his eyes. EXT. TOP OF LAUNCHING TOWER/CHO MING SITE - MORNING The hatch behind Tamara begins to move. The hydraulic supports are being lifted, sealing up the vessel.

He looks at Jackson.

She finds Adrian staring at a wall of monitors showing the horrifying scenario on the platforms. People are falling to their deaths in large numbers in their desperation to board the ship.

dialogue.text: INT. TECHNICAL COMMAND CENTER/AMERICAN SHIP - DAY Laura and the Science Officer enter the Technical Command Center. She finds Adrian staring at a wall of monitors showing the horrifying scenario on the platforms. People are falling to their deaths in large numbers in their desperation to board the ship.

segments.content: What in god's name is happening Adrian?

Outside, panicking workers, screaming for their life! Deserted passengers waving their green cards! Adrian makes a decision and rushes out. INT. BRIDGE/AMERICAN SHIP - DAY Anheuser turns hearing Adrian storming onto the bridge.

character.name: Anheuser convinced them all to launch.

dialogue.text: Outside, panicking workers, screaming for their life! Deserted passengers waving their green cards! Adrian makes a decision and rushes out. INT. BRIDGE/AMERICAN SHIP - DAY Anheuser turns hearing Adrian storming onto the bridge.

segments.content: Anheuser! We have to stop this madness.
With that, Adrian turns to the Communication Officer.
Bobby, make sure the other bridges can
hear this.
The officer hesitates as Laura enters in the background.
What do you think you're doing?
I know exactly what I'm doing.
(To Bobby)
Bobby flicks a switch. Adrian's voice echoes through all the ships.

dialogue.text: Bobby flicks a switch. Adrian's voice echoes through all the ships.

segments.content: This is Adrian Helmsley, science
advisor to President Wilson...

The German Chancellor turns to one of the technicians on the

          bridge of the European Ship.
Can you please turn up the volume, Mr.
Next to her stand the British and French Prime Ministers.

dialogue.text: Next to her stand the British and French Prime Ministers.

segments.content: I know we've all been involved in
making difficult decisions... to save
our human civilization...
Anheuser looks on stoney faced.
... But to be human means to care for
each other, and civilization means to
work together to create a better life.
If that's true there is nothing human
and nothing civilized about what we're
doing here. Ask yourselves ... Can we
really stand by and let all those
people out there die?
Laura watches him proudly.
A civilization that allows that, does
not deserve to survive.
Or at least I don't want to be part of
it.
Anheuser cuts in with sarcasm.
We'll miss you Helmsley but somehow
we'll get by. Officer switch that off.
The Communications Officer looks at Adrian.
That's an order soldier.
INT. BRIDGE/ASIAN SHIP - DAY The Russian President, together with the heads of state from China and Japan, listen in as Adrian responds.

dialogue.text: INT. BRIDGE/ASIAN SHIP - DAY The Russian President, together with the heads of state from China and Japan, listen in as Adrian responds.

segments.content: We have to open our gates and let these
people in. All of them.
Anheuser has had enough.
Have you lost your mind? Look at the
countdown. We have less than five
minutes left... And none of our ships
have the resources to feed those
people. If you save them today we all
starve tomorrow.
He's almost screaming now.
Do you wanna be responsible for the
extinction of the human race? Can you
handle that, Adrian?!
Silence.
Adrian's battle seems lost. But he doesn't give up, and
instead speaks softly now.
There is a young astrophysicist from
India who is the reason we are all
here, trying to give mankind a second
chance. He's the one who discovered it
all, the one who connected the dots. We
all owe him our lives.
All eyes are glued to Adrian.
I just learned that he was killed with
his family by a tsunami in eastern
Adrian stares Anheuser in the eyes as he continues.

dialogue.text: Adrian stares Anheuser in the eyes as he continues.

segments.content: He died because we forgot to pick him
up.
I beg you... whatever our future holds
don't let us start it with an act of
cruelty. What will you tell your
children... and their children?
Silence. Laura steps up alongside Adrian.
If my father were here, he would open
the gates.
Adrian and Laura share a look.
INT. BRIDGE/ASIAN SHIP - DAY His Asian colleagues nod in approval.

character.name: The people of Russia along with...

dialogue.text: INT. BRIDGE/ASIAN SHIP - DAY His Asian colleagues nod in approval.

segments.content: ... China and Japan agree to open the
gates.
The German Chancellor speaks up.
The United Kingdom, Spain, France and
Germany, and I believe I can also speak
for the Italian Prime Minister...
... We vote to open the gates.
Laura and Adrian watch Anheuser shaking his head in defeat.
Bobby, the Communications Officer smiles with relief. Adrian
turns to the Captain.

EXT. LAUNCH SITE/CHO MING VALLEY - DAY One by one the gigantic gates at the stern of the three ships begin to creek open. The masses gathered on the platform CHEER wildly! INT. us!
The whole ceiling begins to lower towards them. From down
below, Jackson sees his son about to be hit by it.

Gordon makes a split second decision. With all his strength, he shoves the boy into the tunnel. INT. ZOOLOGICAL BAY/AMERICAN SHIP - DAY From the other side of the tunnel, Kate watches as the metal ceiling misses Noah by a hair, but catches Gordon, wiping him off the ladder.

ZOOLOGICAL BAY/AMERICAN SHIP - DAY Kate helps a trembling Noah out of the tunnel.

segments.content:
Still on the ledge, Yuri and the boys watch as the huge

          boarding gate lowers towards them. They are trapped.

          Just then, the gates begin to slow, but surely they will be

          crushed.

Back in the chamber, Lin still struggles with the drill.

          Suddenly he slips.

          Jackson manages to catch his fall. But in the process Lin's

          foot gets caught between the gears, mangling it.

          He screams in pain as the hydraulic slowly grinds towards a

          halt.

In great pain, Lin grins back at him. EXT. LAUNCH SITE/CHO MING VALLEY - DAY The gates of the ships hit the access platform with a thundering noise. People begin to rush on board. INT. BRIDGE/AMERICAN SHIP - DAY Alarm signals go off. The Captain turns to one of his officers.

character.name: You did it, man. You did it.

segments.content: What's wrong with the gate?
I don't know. Maybe there's something
jamming it, sir.
The countdown on the monitor reads 2 min. 40 sec. Laura and
Adrian share a worried look.
We hear a HOLLOW BELL ring!
Lama Yak La rings the large bronze bell of his monastery.
The booming sound echoes through the Cho Ming valley. As a
gentle wind catches the Lama's clothes, he looks up--
A tidal wave of immeasurable proportion crests the mountains.
The Lama continues to strike the bell as the monastery is
wiped clean from the earth.

The technicians desperately try to figure out what's wrong.

          An officer waves Adrian over.
Sir, we have a breach in the zoological
bay.
The video camera moves in on Kate, Noah and Lilly. Adrian can't believe his eyes. He turns to Laura.

dialogue.text: The video camera moves in on Kate, Noah and Lilly. Adrian can't believe his eyes. He turns to Laura.

segments.content: I know those kids. Remember the book I
told you about? Their father wrote it.
Captain Michaels shouts across the room.
We're loaded. We can close the gates
sir.

Anheuser looks nervously at the countdown. It reads 1:34 EXT. segments.content: Boys, you gotta move.
We wait for our father! He's still down
there!
The loading officer attempts to comfort them.
There's no one down there.

The Officer and the boys look back as the stern gate slowly closes. But with a SCREECHING sound it grinds to a halt. The gate is jammed open leaving a twenty foot gap. INT. BRIDGE/AMERICAN SHIP - DAY ALARMS sound. Anheuser and the Captain stare at the monitors.

segments.content: Why is the stern gate not closing?
Something's wrong with the hydraulics,
sir.
They race over. Adrian points to a monitor.

dialogue.text: They race over. Adrian points to a monitor.

segments.content: On the monitor, they see Sarah and the others desperately waiting for Jackson and Lin.

character.name: I think we found the problem.

dialogue.text: On the monitor, they see Sarah and the others desperately waiting for Jackson and Lin.

segments.content: How did they get in there?
They must have come through the
hydraulic chamber. There...
Bobby, the Surveillance Officer, selects a different camera
and we now see inside the tunnel in which Jackson is pulling

That guy is injured. Something must
have gone wrong.
You're damn right something went wrong!
Congratulations Helmsley, you may have
just killed us all but as long as your
conscience is clean...
Adrian tries to ignore this.
Let's get an emergency crew there right
now. I'll meet them at the Hydraulic
Anheuser sneers him, shooting a look to Laura.

segments.content: You think you're the main man now, just
because your fucking the President's
daughter?
Without thinking, Adrian turns and punches Anheuser hard in
the face. He drops to the floor, out cold.
Everyone stands in stunned silence. Laura smiles. Adrian
looks around.
They speed off. The countdown reads 0 min. 53 sec.

character.name: What are you all waiting for?

Further down in the valley, the tidal wave has reached the

          Cho Ming airfield, blasting away the planes with overwhelming

          force.

The massive propellers of the ships begin to turn. However,

          In the background, the huge tidal wave comes thundering

          towards them.

An IMPACT WARNING sounds as Adrian and Laura race through the

          officers explains.
If we can't close the stern gate, then
the engines won't start.
There's no way to override it?

A new ALARM sounds as water begins to shoot through the open

The same ALARM rings out in the hallways of the ship. Laura,

          Adrian and their party are all braced against the corridor,

Laura looks unsure.

segments.content: What now?
The rear of the ship will start sealing
itself up one compartment at a time.
Adrian looks at him.
Then how will we get to the hydraulic
chamber?

Despite the violent movement of the ship, Adrian pushes on down the corridor towards the back of the boat. They follow. INT. Jackson is not yet out of the tunnel with an unconscious Lin.

The giant ship drifts upside down and rudderless - smashed

          But then, as it hits another ridge, it rolls right side up

          However, the strong currents continue to force it through the

          mountain ranges of the Himalayas.
The officers try to regain some control.
Moving at 34 knots, sir.
What is our position?
Darjeeling valley, heading south east,
sir.
The Captain's face drops.

or he'll die.

Suddenly Jackson hears a voice over a speaker.

Mr. Curtis... I'm Adrian Helmsley. We
met once before. Your daughter is with
me.
Kate screams with relief.

jammed the hydraulics. If you can't get
it out... None of us will make it.
All eyes are on Adrian as he speaks.
Adrian looks at Laura. INT. ZOOLOGICAL BAY/AMERICAN SHIP - DAY

dialogue.text: Adrian looks at Laura. INT. ZOOLOGICAL BAY/AMERICAN SHIP - DAY

segments.content: I'll go back. I'll try my best.
I'll go with you.
Jackson looks at Kate.

dialogue.text: Jackson looks at Kate.

segments.content: The water is up to their chest now. Jackson takes a breath and disappears underwater. INT. BRIDGE/AMERICAN SHIP - DAY Back on the bridge, Anheuser regains consciousness and gets to his feet. His nose is bleeding. He looks around him.

segments.content: The Captain looks at him annoyed.

dialogue.text: The Captain looks at him annoyed.

segments.content: What's happening?...
We're heading straight for the north
face of Mount Everest, Mr. Anheuser.
Anheuser looks at him dumbfounded as he stumbles to the
window and sees the massive rock face of Mount Everest in the
distance.

Jackson swims down into the dark chamber and reaches the

          jammed power tool, pulling at it. But it doesn't budge.

heading.raw_text: INT. ANTE-CHAMBER ZOOLOGICAL BAY/AMERICAN SHIP - DAY

segments.content:
The water level in Tamara's compartment is at its height now

          and she goes under.

          She struggles below the surface for a moment, looking around

          desperately for a way out but there is none.

          Tamara drowns.

Jackson manages to find an air pocket. He fills up his lungs

          with air and thinks hard.

          As he strips off his jacket, he seems to have a plan. He

          dives under again.

Lin is being held up in the water by his brother and parents.

          Kate has wrapped the belt around his lower leg and now pulls

          it tight. Lin screams.

          Noah uses this as the moment to dive underwater, unnoticed,

          to go and help his father.

Back under water, Jackson is using the extension cord of the

          power drill to pull himself down to the tool cabinet.

          Jackson opens it, retrieving a giant crowbar. He begins to

          use it to dislodge the tool but it's hard work.

Anheuser and everybody on the bridge stares as the north face

          of Mount Everest is almost upon them.

Kate and the Pangs are desperately close to running out of

          air now, but despite this, Kate still tends to Lin.

          After a moment she turns and is first confused then horrified

          to see that Noah is nowhere to be found.

INT. HYDRAULIC CHAMBER/AMERICAN SHIP - DAY Jackson pulls with all his might, but he can't quite shift the drill. To his surprise, a pair of young hands join his on the handle of the crowbar. Noah is alongside him now, helping. Working as father and son, they manage, little by little, to loosen it before finally the drill comes free. Adrian gives Noah the thumbs up and the boy heads back to the surface. Jackson goes to follow but in the last moment he spots the knapsack containing his laptop. He dives back down for it.

To his surprise, a pair of young hands join his on the handle of the crowbar. Noah is alongside him now, helping. Working as father and son, they manage, little by little, to loosen it before finally the drill comes free. Adrian gives Noah the thumbs up and the boy heads back to the surface. Jackson goes to follow but in the last moment he spots the knapsack containing his laptop. He dives back down for it.

segments.content: Noah emerges from the water.

Kate pulls him to her, relieved he is safe. Noah smiles and calls out towards the nearly submerged speaker. INT. CONNECTING CORRIDOR/ZOOLOGICAL BAY - DAY Lilly and Laura wait nervously. They hear a muffled voice.

dialogue.text: Kate pulls him to her, relieved he is safe. Noah smiles and calls out towards the nearly submerged speaker. INT. CONNECTING CORRIDOR/ZOOLOGICAL BAY - DAY Lilly and Laura wait nervously. They hear a muffled voice.

segments.content: We got it free. Can you hear me? We did
it!
Adrian leaps up when he hears this. He flicks a button on the
intercom.
INT. BRIDGE/AMERICAN SHIP - DAY Hearing this, the Captain yells the eagerly awaited order.

dialogue.text: INT. BRIDGE/AMERICAN SHIP - DAY Hearing this, the Captain yells the eagerly awaited order.

segments.content: That's affirmative. Close the gate!

EXT. DARJEELING VALLEY/HIMALAYAS - DAY We hear a BOOMING sound as the tail gate finally seals. INT. HYDRAULIC CHAMBER/AMERICAN SHIP - DAY Jackson reaches his knapsack, but when sees Noah's cell phone lying next to it, he makes a decision and reaches for that instead. He hears the muffled sound of the engines and smiles. But as he turns to swim back, his face freezes-- He's looking into the lifeless eyes of Gordon, who floats inches from his face.

dialogue.text: EXT. DARJEELING VALLEY/HIMALAYAS - DAY We hear a BOOMING sound as the tail gate finally seals. INT. HYDRAULIC CHAMBER/AMERICAN SHIP - DAY Jackson reaches his knapsack, but when sees Noah's cell phone lying next to it, he makes a decision and reaches for that instead. He hears the muffled sound of the engines and smiles. But as he turns to swim back, his face freezes-- He's looking into the lifeless eyes of Gordon, who floats inches from his face.

segments.content:
The gigantic propellers fight against the current, hitting

          rock at the base of the mountain.

The battle seems hopeless. Captain Michaels yells at the top

          of his lungs.
Engage starboard stabilizers!
One is engaged... two is engaged...
number three is out, sir!
The vessel scrapes against the rocks, throwing Anheuser to
the floor.
The giant ship escapes the mountain with an inch to spare.

Everyone on the bridge watches in awe as Mount Everest,

          earth's highest peak, drifts slowly past.

          After a long beat, they begin to holler and cheer.

Kate hears the CHEERING coming from the speakers. The water

          level stops rising but she still looks around in panic.
Noah begins to cry.

dialogue.text: Noah begins to cry.

segments.content: Finally! Jackson bursts out of the water and takes a lungfull of wonderful air. Kate and Noah are overjoyed. The Pangs smile to one another. Jackson looks Kate squarely in the eyes.

dialogue.text: Finally! Jackson bursts out of the water and takes a lungfull of wonderful air. Kate and Noah are overjoyed. The Pangs smile to one another. Jackson looks Kate squarely in the eyes.

segments.content: If you would ever consider to give me
another chance... I promise, I'll
always be there when you need me.
Kate embraces him tightly.
Whatever you do... I will never let you
go again.
Noah is all smiles.
We hear a voice.
... Day 988. No one is waiting for
anything to happen...
The CAMERA moves over the last lines of Jackson's novel.

Adrian sits in his cabin, his copy of `Farewell Atlantis' in

          his lap.
...   and all we can hear is the sound of
our   own breathing that reminds us we
are   still sharing our memories, hopes
and   ideas.
Opposite him, Laura sits listening to him read.
... And funny, just today we found out
that the entire crew of the Atlantis,
somehow or another, has relatives in
Wisconsin.
Adrian closes the book. There's a moment of silence.

dialogue.text: Adrian closes the book. There's a moment of silence.

segments.content: How many copies did you say that sold?
Less than 500.
(with a smile)
It's what you might call a cult
classic.
Laura looks at him grinning.
It seems we have very different tastes
Mr. Helmsley?
Well that's healthy Dr. Wilson.
Something we could maybe explore...
unless you have other pressing
engagements.
The intimate moment is cut short.

dialogue.text: The intimate moment is cut short.

segments.content: (over loudspeaker)
INT. HALLWAY/AMERICAN SHIP - DAY Adrian and Laura make their way to the bridge.

character.name: Mr. Helmsley to the bridge please.

dialogue.text: INT. HALLWAY/AMERICAN SHIP - DAY Adrian and Laura make their way to the bridge.

segments.content: Ladies and gentlemen, this is Captain
Michaels speaking. In a few minutes, I
will be giving the orders to unseal the
decks.

Jackson and his family stand amongst thousands of other

          people who are gathering in anticipation.
Please be careful when you step out and
of course... enjoy the fresh air.
Jackson kneels down and zips up Lilly's jacket. She is
holding Caesar, whose still wearing his diamond collar.
Daddy? When can we go back home?
There's nothing we can go back to
Lil'bee. Whatever's out there, that's
our home now. Don't be scared.
I'm not Daddy. No more pull-ups.
Jackson squeezes Lilly's shoulder.

dialogue.text: Jackson squeezes Lilly's shoulder.

segments.content: Lilly turns to see Yuri's boys standing next to her.

dialogue.text: Lilly turns to see Yuri's boys standing next to her.

segments.content: The boys both smile at her. INT. BRIDGE/AMERICAN SHIP - DAY Adrian and Laura enter the bridge.

character.name: Of course you can. He's your doggie.

dialogue.text: The boys both smile at her. INT. BRIDGE/AMERICAN SHIP - DAY Adrian and Laura enter the bridge.

segments.content: You called for me, sir?
Prof. West has something to show you,
The Captain directs him to a monitor.

dialogue.text: The Captain directs him to a monitor.

segments.content: Looks like your scientific projections
are way off again.
The Captain grins at Prof. West.
The water is receding much faster than
we projected, Adrian...
A monitor reveals an image of the African continent, however
its shape changed dramatically. The image of the southern tip
is enlarged.
What's that?
It's hard to believe, but the Himalayas
are no longer the roof of the world.
It's now the Drakensberg mountains of
Kwa-Zulu Natal. The whole African
continent has risen several thousand
feet and most likely, never even
flooded.
Our European colleagues have already
set course for it.
Captain Michaels hands Adrian a short wave radio.
Adrian curious, grabs the mic.

character.name: Here, somebody wants to talk to you.

dialogue.text: Adrian curious, grabs the mic.

segments.content: We hear a muffled, raspy voice through the speakers. INT. COMMAND BRIDGE/FREEDOM OF THE SEAS - DAY Harry Helmsley stands beside the cruise ship's Captain.

dialogue.text: We hear a muffled, raspy voice through the speakers. INT. COMMAND BRIDGE/FREEDOM OF THE SEAS - DAY Harry Helmsley stands beside the cruise ship's Captain.

segments.content: No, this is Helmsley.
INT. COMMAND BRIDGE/AMERICAN SHIP - DAY Adrian is ecstatic. Captain Michaels explains.

dialogue.text: INT. COMMAND BRIDGE/AMERICAN SHIP - DAY Adrian is ecstatic. Captain Michaels explains.

segments.content: We should have a visual of the `Freedom
of the Seas' shortly.
Dad. We're coming to pick you guys up.
INT. COMMAND BRIDGE/FREEDOM OF THE SEAS - DAY Harry looks over at Tony who's listening, smiling.

dialogue.text: INT. COMMAND BRIDGE/FREEDOM OF THE SEAS - DAY Harry looks over at Tony who's listening, smiling.

segments.content: He's fine, son. We're all fine.
Harry hangs up. He picks up Tony, embracing him wildly. INT. COMMAND BRIDGE/AMERICAN SHIP - DAY Adrian, still excited from speaking with his dad, grabs Laura and kisses her on the lips. She squeals.

character.name: See you guys soon. Bye dad.

dialogue.text: Harry hangs up. He picks up Tony, embracing him wildly. INT. COMMAND BRIDGE/AMERICAN SHIP - DAY Adrian, still excited from speaking with his dad, grabs Laura and kisses her on the lips. She squeals.

segments.content: Adrian looks at Anheuser, unsure of what he might say.

dialogue.text: Adrian looks at Anheuser, unsure of what he might say.

segments.content: Young guys like you with your
idealistic dreams, you think you can
change the world...
Adrian and Laura exchange a look.
I just pray to God, that you keep on
making the right calls... in this new
world of ours.
Adrian nods and with a smile to Laura turns to leave.
Adrian turns back.

dialogue.text: Adrian turns back.

segments.content: There was no one.
Pardon me?
There was no white kid better than you.
Anheuser puts out his hand. Adrian takes it. INT. FRONT DECK/AMERICAN SHIP - DAY

character.name: I'm terribly sorry I said that.

dialogue.text: Anheuser puts out his hand. Adrian takes it. INT. FRONT DECK/AMERICAN SHIP - DAY

segments.content: This is your Captain speaking. Standby
to open Deck 1.
Standing by Sir.
Neng pushes his brother Lin in a wheelchair onto the deck
next to his parents. Mrs. Pang turns to her husband.
(in Chinese)
I wonder will the clouds look the same
and the stars?
Do not fear. Some things will never
change.
The old Chinese man forces a little smile. Closer to the
front of this crowd Jackson approaches Noah.
He takes Noah's cell phone from his pocket and hands it to him.

character.name: I thought you might want this.

dialogue.text: He takes Noah's cell phone from his pocket and hands it to him.

segments.content: Do you think I'll still get a signal
... Dad?
Jackson is touched to hear him use that word. He smiles and
hugs him. Adrian, Laura and Anheuser arrive alongside them.
I finally finished your book Jackson.
Really? You may well be the first
person who ever got to the end.
Jackson looks at her, smiling playfully.
Excuse me, I believe he's addressing
the author. Well, what did you think?
Adrian smiles.
I'd say... those astronauts of yours
would be shitting themselves, if they
knew all their relatives are now stuck
in the South Pole.
Suddenly a horn sounds and the sealed deck doors let off a
burst of pressurised air. A murmur goes through the crowd.
Everyone is silent as the huge deck doors slowly begin to
roll back and light streams in.
The Pang family try to see over people's heads, even Anheuser
looks hopeful. Jackson pulls his family close as the first
rays of daylight hit their faces.

heading.raw_text: EXT. AMERICAN SHIP/SOMEWHERE IN THE HIMALAYAS - DAY

segments.content:
Hatches unseal all around the ship. Sun streams through the

          clouds. Everywhere people emerge outside, into the light of

          day. A majestic moment.

They all stare in awe at the waters receding against the ice-

          covered mountain peaks. Caesar lets out a YELP of joy.

          Almost as soon as the doors have opened, the ship's

          HELICOPTERS take off, flying towards a stunning site--

          The `Freedom of the Seas' is perched on a mountain peak,

          surrounded by calm waters. Behind it, they see the most

          beautiful rainbow. This is the new world.

          And again we hear Mozart's Adagio...
